title: ALIENS Land on White House Lawn, Demand to See the President!
text: In an event that has stunned the world, a silver spacecraft descended upon the White House lawn this morning. Extraterrestrial beings have emerged and are reportedly demanding a meeting with the President to discuss 'the galactic federation'.
subject: conspiracy

title: You Won't BELIEVE What Scientists Found on Mars (It's a Pyramid!)
text: Leaked photos from a NASA rover allegedly show a perfectly formed pyramid on the surface of Mars. Insiders claim the agency is covering up the biggest archaeological find in human history. The structure is said to be miles high.
subject: conspiracy

title: SHOCKING: Government Admits Elections Are Decided by a Secret Society
text: A whistleblower has come forward with explosive documents proving that all national elections are predetermined by a shadowy cabal known as 'The Order'. Your vote doesn't matter, they have already chosen the winner.
subject: politics

title: The Earth is FLAT and This Is How They're Hiding It From You
text: Forget everything you learned in school. A group of independent researchers has released a 200-page report proving that the Earth is a flat disc. They claim that NASA and other space agencies use fish-eye lenses to create the illusion of a spherical planet.
subject: science
